import React from 'react' import { HeaderProps } from '../../interfaces/HeaderProps' import CarClick from '../../assets/carClick.svg' import Breadcrumb, { BreadcrumbProps, BreadcrumbRoute } from '../Breadcrumb' const routes: Array = [ { path: '/home', name: 'Home' }, { path: '/about', name: 'About' }, // Adicione quantas rotas forem necessárias ] const Header: React.FC = ({ onToggleCart, cartItemCount }) => { return (

WeMovies

Meu Carrinho {cartItemCount} itens
) } export default Header
